title: Add end-of-letter footer CTA and in-page video playback

requirements.summary: Add a responsive footer section after the letter sign-off with an English message prompting Radhika to click the button.
acceptanceCriteria: A new footer area is visible at the end of the letter card (below the existing 'Forever Yours ðŸ’•' sign-off).
The footer displays user-facing text in English (e.g., 'I'm not angry. Click the button below.').
The footer content is responsive and looks correct on mobile and desktop without causing overflow or layout shifts.

file_operations.description: Add a new footer section directly after the existing sign-off area, containing a short English reassurance line and a prompt to click the button; ensure layout remains responsive (no overflow) using existing Tailwind theme utilities.

requirements.summary: Add a prominent footer button that opens an in-page video player and plays a local static MP4 without navigating away.
acceptanceCriteria: A button is displayed in the new footer section and is clearly tappable on mobile.
Clicking/tapping the button opens an in-page video player (modal/dialog or inline) and starts playback (or shows controls with autoplay attempt).
The video file is loaded from the frontend as a static asset (not fetched through the backend).
User can pause/close the video player and return to the letter view without a page reload.

file_operations.description: Add the provided video as a static frontend asset so it can be loaded locally by the UI video player (no backend involvement).

Create a reusable in-page video player component (modal/dialog-style or inline overlay) that renders an HTML5 video element pointing to the local static asset, attempts autoplay on open (with controls available), and provides a close action to return to the letter view without navigation.

Add a prominent button within the new footer; manage open/close state for the in-page video player and render LoveVideoPlayer when activated; ensure click does not navigate and video source references the local static asset under frontend/public.

requirements.summary: Style the new footer message, button, and video player to match the existing warm pastel romantic theme without adding any credits/branding.
acceptanceCriteria: The new UI elements visually match the existing theme (colors/typography/rounded corners/shadows).
No footer credit or 'built by' branding is added.
All new elements meet existing responsiveness expectations (usable on small screens).

file_operations.description: Apply theme-consistent styling to the new footer message and button (pastel gradient/romantic palette, rounded corners, soft shadows) using existing Tailwind utilities and current typography conventions; ensure no added credits/branding text.

Style the in-page player container/overlay to match the existing cute romantic look (soft backdrop, rounded card, consistent shadows/typography) and make it responsive (fit within viewport on mobile; prevent overflow).
